pgTitle: List of United States servicemembers and civilians missing in action during the Vietnam War (1966–67)

Navigator on a C-130E #64-0511 shot down while dropping a mine on the Song Ma river. An empty liferaft and aircraft wreckage were later seen by SAR forces. The remains of 3 of the crew were returned in 1986, and 2 other crewmen in 1998
